summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender to Alex Acosta regarding an Epstein hearing that just concluded, indicating a need to discuss the matter urgently.

persons.name: Alex Acosta
persons.context: Recipient of an email discussing an Epstein hearing, indicating he is involved in or needs to be briefed on the matter.

events.title: Epstein hearing
events.description: A hearing related to Jeffrey Epstein's case was held, prompting an urgent email to Alex Acosta.

keyFacts: An email was sent to Alex Acosta on July 11, 2008, immediately following an Epstein hearing.
The sender indicates an urgent need to talk about the hearing with Acosta.
The email's importance is marked as 'High', suggesting the matter was time-sensitive or critical.
